document_data.mainbody:
he Seal of fate was a magical item that could be found in Zakhara, the Land of Fate.
This item appeared as a seal with letters carved deeply into its surface.
If pressed against someones palm, the seal would mark them with a magical imprint. The mark was invisible but did radiate magic and could be seen by casting a detect invisibility spell. A person could only be marked once.
With this mark a person could attempt to alter the fate of any outcome to their favor. Each time the seal was used there was a chance that it would disappear forever.
